Outcome.DescriptionText: Your combat engineers discover a large cache of ancient equipment. The recovered items will make a nice profit on the open market.
While entering the abandoned warehouse your troops spot a large weapons cache, which is worth a lot on the black market.

As your troops approach the abandoned warehouse they all agree that this building once cleaned up could provide extra storage for your empire. But as they get closer they see a nest of Antlions that has made its home here and your troops find themselves surrounded by foes.

As your troops approach abandoned warehouse, they notice signs of recent activity. As they explore the warehouse further they accidentally trip a security system which sends out a Remnant distress signal. A detachment of Remnant forces are alerted to your presence and start orbiting the planet.
